mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT c.userid "USERID", pNum, cNum, cContent, createDate, updateDate, parentNum, cLevel, nickname, userimage FROM comments c JOIN member m ON c.userid=m.userid) WHERE pNum=#{pNum} START WITH cLevel = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR cNum = parentNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (pNum, cNum, userid, cContent, createDate, parentNum, cLevel) VALUES (#{pNum},comments_num.NEXTVAL,#{userid},#{cContent},SYSDATE,#{parentNum},#{cLevel})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comments WHERE cNum IN (SELECT cNum FROM comments START WITH cNum=#{cNum} CONNECT BY PRIOR cNum = parentNum)
